Text.Page: Jelena is looking for you and Titus. Speak with Jelena.

<PCNAME> tried to destroy the engine, but Lumikan overloaded the Black Core and caused a massive explosion. However, Elleon sacrificed himself and minimized the damage. With Elleon's body, <PCNAME> headed back to Velika.

I can feel it. Elleon is here.

It's all up to us. Let's get in, save Elleon, and put an end to Exodor. Ready when you are.

Like Titus said, we need to destroy the control system.

We have to get higher up though... Let's split up and find a way up.

Titus and I will take the right.

Good.

Now, all we have to do is destroy this place and the control system, right?

I'm sorry. I can't remember anything after the battle in Iridian Wetlands.

It's as if I woke up...and all of a sudden I'm here now.

Where are we?"This is the engine room of Exodor."

I see...this is the engine room...

We should destroy this place first and think next.

(Jelena is still having a hard time recovering.)

(You ask if she's okay)

Urgh...yes...I'm fine now.
(Elleon took his last breath stopping the explosion. He lies still.)

We...we're alive...

Not all of us though...

I heard news about Exodor. If it weren't for Elleon, the whole world would have faced great danger.

But...I never thought we'd lose him...
